meanings.definition: A person who attests or certifies.
meanings.sent1: The attesters signed the document to confirm its authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer was the official attester of the will.
meanings.sent3: The attesters at the ceremony wore matching badges for fun.
meanings.sent4: She was the attester of good deeds, always recognizing others' efforts.
meanings.sent5: The attesters in the courtroom wore solemn expressions, showing their importance.

meanings.definition: To bear witness or testify to the truth of something.
meanings.sent1: The witnesses attesters the events as they unfolded.
meanings.sent2: He attesters that he saw the crime take place.
meanings.sent3: The cat attesters to the mischief by leaving paw prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her smile attesters to her happiness, shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The stars attesters to the vastness of the universe, twinkling above.
